name: Mechastraction
description:
Created during a TriJam

Time require : 4 hours 40 minutes (Mission failed)

To destroy the giant mecha, you have to stay in the yellow light that represent the vision. It will increase the distraction bar, once it reach the maximum the boss will receive the damage.

Arrow key or WASD for the movement

I didn't have the time to add some pattern and to create a music. Maybe I will try to be better for the next TriJam. My goal was to force the player to go to the yellow area in order to take more risk.

I am also aware there is a glitch when the boss move, the yellow bar still increase no matter where you are. Please try to stay in the yellow area to complete the challenge.
